code: import{useEffect,useState}from'react';import{supabase}from'../lib/supabaseClient';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Dashboard=()=>{const[episodes,setEpisodes]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{fetchEpisodes();},[]);async function fetchEpisodes(){const{data}=await supabase.from('episodes').select();setEpisodes(data||[]);}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"text-3xl font-bold mb-6",children:"TELsTP Sonic Core"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"text-lg mb-6",children:"Unified sound system for \"From Fire in the Void to Edited Genomes\""}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"bg-white p-6 rounded shadow mb-6",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"text-xl font-semibold mb-4",children:"Episodes"}),episodes.map(ep=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"border-b py-2",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:ep.title})," \u2013 ",ep.status," (",ep.progress,"%)"]},ep.id))]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"bg-blue-600 text-white px-6 py-2 rounded hover:bg-blue-700",children:"Send to Character AI"})]});};export default Dashboard;
